Section.Catchline: Conveyances by merger or conversion of business entities.

SectionBody.Text: As to any merger or conversion of business entities prior to June 15, 2000, the title to all real estate, or any interest therein, owned by a business entity that was a party to a merger or a conversion is vested in the surviving entity without reversion or impairment, notwithstanding the requirement of a deed which was previously required by s. 607.11101, s. 608.4383, former s. 620.204, former s. 620.8904, or former s. 620.8906.
